thread.title: Japan is building an indoor lettuce farm that will be tended by robotic farmers
thread.title_full: Japan is building an indoor lettuce farm that will be tended by robotic farmers - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Japan is building an indoor lettuce farm that will be tended by robotic farmers
text: Japan's Spread Vegetable Factory is working on a novel way of producing high quantities of lettuce using factory automation. The plant will be able to produce 30,000 heads of lettuce in a single day starting in summer 2017 with a goal of 500,000 heads of lettuce with five years. Â»
